requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

*email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^([a-z0-9_-]+.) *[a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9_-]+(.[ a-z0-9_-]+)*. [a-z] {2,6}$/

*password - string, user password. Must contain min 6, max 16 at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number
Pattern: /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*d).*$/

All fields are required!

201.description:
The user is registered successfully

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:
token - string, the user's token
email - string, the user's email address in object user.

400.description:
BadRequest

If the mail is not valid: This email is not valide
If the password is not valid: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number or password length must be at least 6 characters long and less than or equal to 16 characters long

requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

phone - string, user phone number. Can contain: any number, plus symbol, opening and closing bracket symbols, hyphen (minus) character, space character.

name - string, the user's name. Must contain min 2, max 16. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, the apostrophe symbol, spaces and hyphens.
pattern /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я' -]+$/

email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^([a-z0-9_-]+.) *[a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9_-]+(.[ a-z0-9_-]+)*. [a-z] {2,6}$/

birthday - date, the user's birthday. max date - now, example format: 1980-04-15T00:00:00.000Z

city - string, user city. Must contain min 2, max 100. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, as well as separators in the form of a space or hyphen. At the same time, it does not allow a delimiter string to begin or end and does not allow the use of two delimiters in a row.
Pattern: /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+(?:[s-][a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+)*$/

You can pass any of the fields!

200.description:
The data was updated successfully

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

_id - string, user _id

phone - string, user phone number. Can contain: any number, plus symbol, opening and closing bracket symbols, hyphen (minus) character, space character.

name - string, the user's name. Must contain min 2, max 16. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, the apostrophe symbol, spaces and hyphens.
pattern /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я' -]+$/

email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^([a-z0-9_-]+.) *[a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9_-]+(.[ a-z0-9_-]+)*. [a-z] {2,6}$/

avatarURL - string, the path to the uploaded user avatar

favorite - array with id favorite notices

birthday - date, the user's birthday. max date - now, example format: 1980-04-15T00:00:00.000Z

city - string, user city. Must contain min 2, max 100. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, as well as separators in the form of a space or hyphen. At the same time, it does not allow a delimiter string to begin or end and does not allow the use of two delimiters in a row.
Pattern: /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+(?:[s-][a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+)*$/

get.summary: Search for notices by category and title

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the notices to search for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query to match against notice titles

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of notices to retrieve per page

200.description:
Successful operation

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

notices - array, with objects notices

_id - string, notice id

title - string, notice title

category - string, notice category, 1 of 3 categorys (sell, lost-found, for-free)

price - string, minimum 1

name - string, required. The pet's name. Must contain min 2, max 16.

birthday - date, required. The pets's birthday, max date - now

breed - string, pet breed. Must contain min 2, max 16.

place - string, format city

sex - string, 1 of 2 (male, female)

comments - string, сomment on the pet. Must contain min 8, max 120.

owner - string, user ID, who owns the notice

photoURL - string, path to photo

total - integer, total objects

totalPages - integer, total pages

currentPage - integer, current page

limit - integer, the maximum number of notices to retrieve per page

404.description: There are no notices for this request
